reviewText: Won Bin portrays a rebellious and provocative youth who after the untimely death of his brother (it should have been him) finds redemption and solace in the shared childhood memories. In Won Bin's relative short career, he has managed to secure a place in Korean and world cinema as a deeply affecting and nuanced actor. His films are all a tour de force. Not only is he a model and Asian male beauty icon, he is also a great actor, as seen in this quiet gem.
